resources.string: Check CPU frequencies used,time when they were used and check informations regarding Kernel version
Just system changes,for RR changes go to Device Info/About ROM

He is the one who brought Resurrection Remix to Ariesve and Ancora devices, at a certain point he created a custom ROM source just for these two devices and the main purpose of it was to make the ROM even better for these devices by including fixes for only those devices and custom features coming from the user side . The ROM became to be very popular and many users continued to use it since January when it was released for the first time.

He is the Author of the many commits applied to the Kernel sources and also for the ancora device tree. He is not very active on XDA as per posts count but he is very active on Github as per public activity log. After Arco left the ancora community for good he remained the only one to work for the ancora community. Along with nilac sirmordred continue to make new changes for the new coming RR builds and also for the new CM 12.1 builds for ancora.
